# Proyecto Humboldt Digital

As part of the Humboldt Digital project at the Berlin-Brandenburg Academy of Sciences and Humanities, I worked on:

- Editorial curation of digital editions
- Data modeling and infrastructure setup
- Development of the *Dossier Digital: Alexander von Humboldt and Cuba*
